text:
My cousin recently announced a kickstarter that may be of interest to those of you who enjoy card (or board) games:  

<https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1575905346/rules-twist-hilarious-house-rules-for-board-and-ca>

attachments.title: Rules Twist - Hilarious House Rules for Board & Card Games
attachments.text: Play classic games with a Twist! Easily add hilarious house rules to any board or card game. You won't play without Rules Twist again
attachments.fallback: Kickstarter: Rules Twist - Hilarious House Rules for Board & Card Games
